job.title: Lead React Developer (Next.js, Ionic)
job.about: We are looking for a talented Lead React Developer to join our development team at our forward-thinking company, focusing on enhancing our market-leading wealth management platform. You will join us at an exciting time as we continue to modernize our digital offerings, focusing on delivering exceptional user experiences for our clients and advisers.
responsibilities: Implement state-of-the-art frontend solutions using React and Next.js
Lead code reviews and uphold high standards across the team
Translate design wireframes into high-quality code alongside UX designers
Document component functionality and features in Storybook
Utilize the Ionic framework to develop cross-platform capabilities
Adhere to best practices to write clean, maintainable code
Maintain robust test coverage for new and existing features
Engage in code reviews and contribute to technical discussions within the team
Actively participate in agile ceremonies, promoting continuous process improvements
Collaborate on API integrations and implementations with backend teams
requirements: 5+ years of professional experience building web applications
Strong proficiency in React.js and Next.js
Proficiency in modern HTML5 and CSS3
Understanding of Context API for state management
Competency in using Git for version control
Experience with frontend testing practices (Jest, React Testing Library)
Excellent communication skills and a knack for teamwork
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively
nice_to_have: Experience with Azure and DevOps practices
we_offer: Work on a flexible schedule remotely or from any of our comfortable offices or coworking spaces in Ukraine
Receive the necessary equipment to perform your work tasks
Change projects and technology stacks within EPAM
Gain experience in various business domains
Consider relocation options in over 30 countries worldwide
Participate in volunteer, charity programs and communities
Individual career path planning with manager
Regular feedback from colleagues
Free English training with certified teachers
Free training and certification in AWS, GCP, or Azure Clouds
Access to internal E-learn training program
Access to corporate accounts on LinkedIn Learning
Study at EPAM Solution Architecture School
Develop as a leader
Participate in internal communities
Vacation and sick leave
Voluntary Medical Insurance programs
Medical insurance for family members at corporate rates
Company support during significant life events
Support for psychological comfort
E-kids program
